alert.note: Alert for Bath; Fleming; Montgomery (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 26 at 5:19PM EDT until May 26 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Montgomery County in east central Kentucky... Northwestern Bath County in east central Kentucky... Northern Fleming County in east central Kentucky... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 519 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sharpsburg, or 13 miles north of Mount Sterling, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Pecks Ridge around 535 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Craintown, Flemingsburg and Mount Carmel. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
